sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel's military operation in Jenin leaves at least 13 Palestinians dead, as Prime Minister Netanyahu warns that it is not a one-time thing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukraine accuses Russia of provocations at the Zaporizhia nuclear plant, as staff withdraw and locals prepare for a nuclear emergency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Real Madrid's Carlo Ancelotti will take over as head coach of Brazil's national team next year, according to sources in the Brazilian Football Association.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Israeli footage of its operation in a Jenin refugee camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Its troops have now withdrawn from the West Bank militant stronghold, ending a two-day raid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The mission has killed at least 13 Palestinians and driven thousands from their homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: One Israeli soldier was killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Convoys of military vehicles have been seen leaving less than 48 hours after the offensive started.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As the withdrawal began, militants in the Gaza Strip launched five rockets into Israel, which were intercepted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel duly responded with their own airstrikes on Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Earlier, a car ramming and stabbing in Tel Aviv had been a Hamas militant response to the operation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israel's Prime Minister said Jenin is not a one-off. We will continue to fight terror as much as necessary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We will not allow Jenin to return to being a target city for terror.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We will fight terror wherever we see it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We will fight it." While Israel remains bullish, the UN has condemned the scale of the air and ground operations, especially the airstrikes hitting a densely populated refugee camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel's military said the counter-terrorism operation had been focused on seizing weapons and targeting terrorists. Russia has reportedly been reducing its presence at the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: according to Ukrainian military intelligence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Several representatives of Russia's state nuclear agency, Rosatom, are believed to have already left.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian employees who stayed at the plant and signed contracts with Rosatom are believed to have already left. Ukrainian employees who stayed at the plant and signed contracts with Rosatom had been told to evacuate by July 5th, preferably to Crimea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In his latest address, President Zelenskyy accused Russia of planning dangerous provocations at the Moscow-controlled plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He claims Russia has installed explosives to sabotage the nuclear facility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In nearby Zaporizhia city, training sessions are being organized to instruct people what to do in case of a nuclear disaster. A group of journalists attended a training, learning how to pack an emergency suitcase and how to prepare a makeshift mouth mask. The authorities are hoping they'll write about it so others will benefit from the instructions. But how worried are the locals and what do they think of the preparations? Я думаю, к этому никак не приготовишься. Единственное, быть в курсе и вовремя, зная направление ветра, уехать в другую сторону.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Да, я считаю, что для моей семьи это загроза. Насколько серьезно, не знаю. Но в любом случае это загроза. Чернобыль я помню. Meanwhile, Ukraine's military has released images of its troops using a grand rocket launcher.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukraine says it's making territorial gains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But Western allies say the full counteroffensive hasn't happened yet and that Russian landmines are slowing down Ukrainian troops. Russia says it shot down five Ukrainian drones over Moscow in a rare attack

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: near the capital, which disrupted an international airport. Meanwhile, Ukraine reported several Russian strikes, including one in Kharkiv, which injured at least 38 people, including 12 children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: An explosion in the town of Pervomersky sparked a fire causing damage to homes and cars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian strikes in Kherson killed two people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The attack also damaged residential buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Legal teams have launched a pre-trial investigation into whether there's been a violation of the laws and customs of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The drone attack in Moscow followed similar raids on the capital but was the first known assault since the failed mutiny of mercenary chief Yevgeny Prigozhin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has not admitted to launching the drone raid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Russia says four out of five drones were downed by air defenses and the fifth was electronically jammed and forced down.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: There were no reported casualties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In May, two drone attacks hit the Russian capital in what appeared to be Kyiv's deepest strikes into Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Diplomatic tensions are running high between Tbilisi and Kyiv over the fate of Georgia's former president Mikhail Saakashvili.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A Ukrainian citizen, Saakashvili is currently in prison in Georgia, charged with abuse of office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: On Tuesday, President Zelenskyy ordered the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to summon Georgia's ambassador and request that he leave Ukraine within 48 hours to hold consultations in Tbilisi over Saakashvili's treatment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Tbilisi called it an extreme escalation of diplomatic relations between the historically friendly countries, while the Minister of Justice denied that Saakashvili is being mistreated. და მითვიმეთ ის იმფონზე, როდესაც საქარკველო უკრაინელეხავხის გვერდის დგას აპსოლუტურად გველა კრიდითულს სიტვაციაში, ართორედ ამ სიტვაციაში დანსაკულების სანთუხაროვ არის ეს განცხადების. The situation is very critical.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We must take action.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Saakashvili was arrested in Tbilisi in October 2021, soon after his return from Ukraine, after a long hunger strike has helped deteriorate it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The former president has appealed to the European Court of Human Rights to use an interim measure to be transferred abroad for treatment. The request was rejected but consideration of the case continues in Strasbourg. მედრიველის მისინებით და სამკურნალობის მისინით, მათშორის ბუნებრებია ერთ-ერთ შესაძრებლობად განიხილებო და უქრაინის ოპციაც. რესურსი ამის ცხადია არსებობს, არივეთ არის სამათლებრივი და Ukraine recalled its ambassador to Georgia in March of last year, partly due to Tbilisi's refusal to participate in international sanctions against Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Tension on the streets has spilled over into the courts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: On Tuesday, the Lyon Judicial Court had to suspend the fast-track hearings of those allegedly involved in the riots after some 30 left-wing activists tried to prevent the arrest of a man wearing an anti-police t-shirt.

sentences.sentence: When they resumed, only lawyers, experts and those involved had access to the courtrooms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Google has been fined 2 million euros in France over its search engine and Google Play Store.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The French Directorate General for Competition, Consumer Affairs and Fraud Control said the tech giant hadn't complied with rules on providing some information on ranking criteria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The watchdog also said searches on tourism accommodation lacked explanations for the prices, and Google Play Store did not give consumers reasons for not publishing their reviews of apps.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The inspections took place in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Twitter company from Facebook's parent company Meta, Instagram Threads, is due to launch on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Threads is billed as a text-based conversation app that's linked to Instagram.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Instagram users will be able to keep their usernames and follow the same accounts on the new app.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Threads is another headache for Twitter's owner Elon Musk, who has faced backlash over new daily limits on the number of tweets that users can read.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: over new daily limits on the number of tweets that users can read. The Spanish government on Tuesday declared an official end to the health crisis caused

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: by the Covid-19 pandemic and said people no longer have to wear masks in health and care centres or pharmacies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over the past two years, Spain has gradually ended the mandatory mask wearing, first in public and then on public transport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The country has registered 14 million cases and 122,000 deaths from the coronavirus since 2020.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Carlo Ancelotti is set to be confirmed as the future coach of Brazil's national team,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: according to a source in the Brazilian Football Association quoted by news agency AFP.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The 64-year-old Italian is currently manager of Real Madrid, but will reportedly join Brazil in June 2024 when his contract with the Spanish giant ends.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Speculation has intensified after the Brazilian EFA announced that Fluminense coach Fernando Diniz would take on the role on an interim basis for a year.
